name: Ifrit EZ
description:
This was my final project for a game design class I took.

The purpose of it was to demake a game, I chose to demake the Ifrit fight from Final Fantasy XIV. Of course with this being a demake, don't expect it to be too similar, I did my best.

Make sure to play in Full screen!!

Controls:

1: Attack

2: Heal

3: Sprint

Enjoy!!!
